thread.title: CPPCC members attend press conference on improving people's livelihood
thread.title_full: CPPCC members attend press conference on improving people's livelihood

title: CPPCC members attend press conference on improving people's livelihood
text: CPPCC members attend press conference on improving people's livelihood chinadaily.com.cn | 2017-03-09 11:03 CPPCC members Huang Jiefu (third from right), Wang Wenbiao (second from right), Xu Jiayin (third from left), Hu Xiaoyi (first right) and Li Yanhong (second from left) wave to reporters at a press conference at the fifth session of the 12th CPPCC National Committee on improving people's livelihood in Beijing, China, March 9, 2017. They will answer questions on targeted poverty alleviation, improving the level of public healthcare, expanding employment by encouraging business startups, promoting services for the elderly and pushing energy conservation, environment protection and ecological construction. [Kuang Linhua/China Daily]
